ssot__UserGroup__dlm.name: User Group
ssot__UserGroup__dlm.description: The User Group DMO represents a grouping of system users with common characteristics to simplify the granting of privileges and access to resources.

ssot__Alias__c.description: The alias for the user group.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the user group.

ssot__IsQueue__c.description: An indicator if the user group is a queue.

ssot__IsRegularGroup__c.description: An indicator if the user group is a regular group.

ssot__IsRole__c.description: An indicator if the user group is a role.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name___c.description: The name of the user group.

ssot__UserGroupId__c.description: A reference ID to the user group for the user group.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the user group DMO.
